General.Name: Jiangsu Libert Inc
General.Description: Jiangsu Libert INC. designs, manufactures, and sells industrial modules in China and internationally. The company offers process modules that are used in the chemical, oil and gas energy, mining, water treatment, and other industries; pipe gallery modules; and pipeline prefabricated parts. It also provides various engineering services, including engineering design, procurement, construction, and maintenance, as well as general contracting, planning and feasibility of the engineering project, performance research, project cost and economic analysis, and trial operation services; and equipment, system inspection, maintenance, and other services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.
